name: Pampers Baby Dry Size 4 Maxi Carry Pack 30
description: With new Pampers Baby Dry, your baby will enjoy up to 12 hours of overnight dryness for great mornings. That’s because new Baby Dry nappies come with an improved Extra Sleep Layer that now absorbs even faster to help keep wetness away from your baby’s skin. Give them the overnight protection they need for Golden Sleep with new Pampers Baby Dry nappies. Use with Pampers Sensitive Wipes, which are clinically proven to be mild on baby’s skin and help protect every wrinkle and fold.
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Preparation_and_Usage>To avoid danger of suffocation and/or strangulation, keep all packaging material away from babies and children.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
PromotionDescription: £12.50 off when you spend £50 or more on selected Baby products (excludes infant milk)
